alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 27 at 6:34AM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor and Eastern San Gabriel Mountains. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While wind gusts are generally expected to peak between 50 and 55 mph, there is a moderate risk for gusts to exceed 60 mph. That risk is the basis for this High Wind Watch.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
